tool_description: Tradingview API for technical analysis. With indicators, ocillicators, summaries etc.
title: Tradingview TA API (Technical Analysis)

api_list.name: Get Symbols From Exchange
Get Analysis From Symbol
Get Exchanges From Screener
Get Screeners
api_list.code:
import requests

url = "https://tradingview-ta-api-technical-analysis.p.rapidapi.com/get_screeners"

headers = {
    "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
    "X-RapidAPI-Host": "tradingview-ta-api-technical-analysis.p.rapidapi.com"
}

response = requests.get(url, headers=headers)

print(response.json())
